constituent: hem, cloak, reside, flag, old, tombstone, gravestone, church, ten, needle, mouth
koohiiStory1: Something is residing in the hem of your cloak. Maybe you should consider cleaning it? キョ コ すそ cuff; hem; foot of mountain.
koohiiStory2: If you reside in the slums, you start off as a small child with a very large cloak. As you grow it gets hemmed. The rich kids just get new cloaks.
words: 裾(すそ): (trouser) cuff, (skirt) hem, cut edge of a hairdo, foot of mountain
